sentences.sContent: Orton’s plays transgress accepted social norms.
sentences.sCn: 奥顿的戏剧违背了公认的社会准则。

remMethod.val: trans(横向) + gress(走) → 横着走 → 冒犯

words.tran: [地质] 海侵；犯罪；违反；逸出

trans.tranCn: 违反, 犯罪, 侵犯
trans.tranOther: to do something that is against the rules of social behaviour or against a moral principle
